scripts.create-folder-structure: mkdir -p dist/css && mkdir -p dist/javascript && mkdir -p dist/images
scripts.copy-libs: cp src/css/* dist/css/ && cp src/javascript/* dist/javascript/ && cp src/images/* dist/images/
scripts.add-external-libs: cp node_modules/@ajusa/lit/dist/lit.css dist/css/ && cp node_modules/jquery/dist/jquery.min.js dist/javascript/
scripts.build: npm run add-git-hooks && npm run clear-dist && npm install && npm run create-folder-structure && npm run copy-libs && npm run add-external-libs && npm run transform-html-files
